        Return the width of the given text String in px using.

      • getCharacterWidth

        public int getCharacterWidth(char currentCharacter,
                    char nextCharacter,
                    float size)
        Return the width in px of the given character including kerning information taking the next character into account.
        Parameters:
        currentCharacter - current character
        nextCharacter - next character
        size - font size
        Returns:
        width of the character or -1 when no information for the character is available

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Return the filename this font originates from.
        Returns:
        the filename of the font
